item.title: Developer Contact Template for Usability Review
item.description: Hi «name» I’m Zachary Mullis, and I run usability reviews of games which identify usability and UX issues that will prevent players from experiencing it the way you expect. I saw your post looking for playters for «game», and wondered if you would be interesting in a usability review for it. I will identify usability problems, and send you a report covering the top issues. I wouldn’t charge for the review, but I’d also be really interested in sharing this as a cast study on my portfolio/blog (https://mulliszl.
